price: A sì kúkú ti rán (Ànábì) Nūh sí ìjọ rẹ̀ (láti sọ pé) dájúdájú olùkìlọ̀ pọ́nńbélé ni mo jẹ́ fún yín.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِۦٓ إِنِّي لَكُمۡ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٌ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: walaqad arsalnā nūḥan ilā qawmihi innī lakum nadhīrun mubīnun
